name: Ninja Gainyk 2
description:
Only the best and fastest ninjas can call themselves the Gainyk ninjas.

In this game, you have to stack your score by cutting the paint balls that are thrown in the air in front of you while you have a time that keeps tracks of the duration of your trainings.

Can you prove that you can be as fast as you are precise? Keep up with the timers to solve levels and go on.

Speed and precision is required to solve all the stages, mistakes are allowed but you should try and keep them at a minimum.
